0.name: Ana García
0.quote: El chatbot de WhatsApp nos ha cambiado la vida. Ahorramos 15 horas semanales en consultas repetitivas y nuestros clientes están encantados con la atención 24/7. La inversión se recuperó en 4 meses.

1.name: José Martínez

2.name: Laura Rodríguez
2.quote: Los workflows de contenido con IA nos permiten gestionar 3x más clientes con el mismo equipo. El curso de formación fue fundamental para aprovechar todo el potencial. Totalmente recomendable.

faq.title: Preguntas Frecuentes sobre Automatización Empresarial con IA
faq.subtitle: Resolvemos tus dudas sobre agentes de IA y optimización de procesos

0.q: ¿Qué es un agente de IA para negocios y cómo puede ayudar a mi empresa?
0.a: Un agente de IA es un sistema inteligente que puede realizar tareas específicas de forma autónoma, como responder consultas de clientes, procesar documentos, gestionar citas o automatizar flujos de trabajo.
0.extra: Para tu empresa en Sevilla, esto significa ahorro de tiempo, reducción de errores humanos y disponibilidad 24/7. Por ejemplo, un administrador de fincas puede tener un agente que gestione incidencias de comunidades automáticamente por WhatsApp.

1.q: ¿Cuánto cuesta implementar automatización con IA en mi empresa?
1.a: El coste varía según la complejidad del proyecto. Los proyectos simples como chatbots de WhatsApp o automatizaciones básicas pueden arrancar desde presupuestos accesibles para PYMEs.
1.extra: Ofrecemos consultas gratuitas donde analizamos tu caso específico y te damos un presupuesto personalizado. La mayoría de nuestros clientes recuperan la inversión en menos de 6 meses gracias al ahorro de tiempo y recursos.

2.q: ¿Necesito conocimientos técnicos para usar sistemas de automatización?
2.a: No, en absoluto. Diseñamos todas nuestras soluciones para que sean intuitivas y fáciles de usar. Además, incluimos formación práctica para tu equipo.
2.extra: También ofrecemos cursos de IA en Sevilla donde aprenderás a usar herramientas como ChatGPT, automatizaciones y más, sin necesidad de conocimientos previos de programación.

3.q: ¿Qué diferencia a Ordinaly de otras empresas de automatización?
3.a: Somos un equipo local en Sevilla que entiende las necesidades específicas de las empresas andaluzas. No somos una consultora internacional que aplica soluciones genéricas.
3.extra: Nos especializamos en PYMEs y sectores específicos (inmobiliarias, administradores de fincas, marketing, retail) y combinamos automatización con formación práctica para que tu equipo sea autónomo.

4.q: ¿Cuánto tiempo tarda en implementarse un proyecto de automatización?
4.a: Los proyectos simples como chatbots o automatizaciones básicas pueden estar funcionando en 2-4 semanas.
4.extra: Proyectos más complejos como implementación de CRM/ERP con Odoo o workflows avanzados pueden tomar entre 1-3 meses, dependiendo del alcance. Siempre trabajamos por fases para que veas resultados rápidos.

5.a: Sí, por supuesto. Incluimos soporte técnico y mantenimiento. Al estar basados en Sevilla, podemos hacer reuniones presenciales cuando sea necesario.
5.extra: Además, nuestros sistemas son escalables: a medida que tu negocio crece, podemos ampliar y mejorar las automatizaciones sin empezar desde cero.

seoArticle.title: Business Automation with AI in Seville: The Complete Guide
seoArticle.intro: Business automation with artificial intelligence has gone from a futuristic option to a competitive necessity for SMEs in Seville and across Andalusia. At Ordinaly, we help local companies implement AI agents for business that radically transform their daily operations.

section1.title: What are AI Agents and how do they benefit your business in Seville?
section1.body: AI agents are intelligent systems designed to perform specific tasks autonomously. Unlike simple chatbots, these agents can make decisions, learn from previous interactions, and execute complex workflows without human intervention. For a real estate company in Seville, this means managing customer inquiries 24/7, scheduling visits automatically, and generating property descriptions in seconds.

section2.title: Industries that benefit most from AI automation in Andalusia
section2.body: Our experience working with Andalusian businesses has shown that certain sectors gain immediate benefits:

list.0: Property managers: Incident automation, community communications, and vendor management. A manager in Seville can save up to 20 hours per week with our systems.
list.1: Real estate agencies: Conversational agents that qualify leads, schedule visits, and automatically send property information. Ideal for Seville agencies handling dozens of listings at once.
list.2: Marketing agencies: Automation of social media posts, AI-powered content generation, and campaign analytics. Seville agencies working with us manage 3x more clients with the same team.
list.3: Retail commerce: Intelligent inventory management, demand forecasting, and automated customer support via WhatsApp Business.

section3.title: AI training for companies: The essential complement
section3.body: We don't just implement technology: we train your team to be self-sufficient. Our artificial intelligence courses in Seville are 100% practical and focused on real use cases. From introductory ChatGPT to advanced automations with Make and Zapier, we tailor training to your sector's specific needs.

section4.title: Why choose Ordinaly to automate your business in Seville?
section4.body: We're software engineers specialized in AI with a physical headquarters in Seville. This sets us apart from international consultancies that apply generic solutions:

list.0: Knowledge of the local market: We understand the nuances of Andalusian SMEs
list.1: In-person availability: Face-to-face meetings at our downtown Seville office
list.2: 100% tailored solutions: We don't use templates. Every project is designed specifically for you
list.3: Training included: Your team learns to manage and improve the systems we implement
list.4: Ongoing support: We don't disappear after implementation

cta.title: Ready to make the leap to business automation?
cta.body: Book a free consultation and discover how AI agents can transform your business in Seville. No commitment—we analyze your case and show you concrete automation opportunities.

formation.introduction: At Ordinaly, we offer specialized training in emerging technologies and professional development. Our courses are designed to boost your professional career with up-to-date content and innovative methodologies.
formation.bonificationDisclaimer: Some of our training courses may be eligible for funding through FUNDAE/SEPE and/or fit into co-financed calls by FSE+ and PRTR-NextGenerationEU, as long as your company meets the requirements and processes the aid. Ordinaly provides the course documentation but does not request or process bonuses or grants on behalf of the client. Always check the official links before contracting.

courseDetails.title: Course Details

courseDetails.courseFinishedMessage: This course has already started and is no longer accepting new enrollments

fullScheduleText.everyOtherWeekOnWeekdays: Every other week on {weekdays} from {startDate} to {endDate}, {startTime} - {endTime}

bonificationTexts.summary: Some of our training may be subsidized via FUNDAE/SEPE or fit into calls co-financed by FSE+ and PRTR-NextGenerationEU, provided your company meets requirements and processes the aid independently.
bonificationTexts.details:
**FUNDAE / SEPE - Company-sponsored training:** allows part of the training cost to be subsidized through Social Security contributions. Official info for Companies ([FUNDAE](https://www.fundae.es/empresas)) and Training for employees ([SEPE](https://www.sepe.es/HomeSepe/empresas/informacion-para-empresas/formacion-para-ocupados.html)).

**EU Funds - FSE+ 2021-2027:** national and regional programs (including Andalusia) that finance employment, education, and training actions through public calls. See [UAFSE](https://www.mites.gob.es/UAFSE/es/FSE21_27/programas/index.htm).

**PRTR - NextGenerationEU (Component 23):** measures for training and active employment policies; coverage depends on each call. Official info from the [Recovery Plan](https://planderecuperacion.gob.es/politicas_y_componentes/componente-23-nuevas-politicas-publicas-para-un-mercado-de-trabajo-dinamico-resiliente-e-inclusivo) and [SEPE](https://www.sepe.es/HomeSepe/empresas/informacion-para-empresas/formacion-para-ocupados.html).

**Andalusia (regional):** FSE+ Andalusia 2021-2027 and Vocational Training for Employment (FPE) publish specific grants/calls. See [Junta de Andalucía](https://www.juntadeandalucia.es/organismos/economiahaciendayfondoseuropeos/areas/fondos-europeos-andalucia/normativa-programacion/programacion/programacion-2021-2027/paginas/europeos-social-2021-2027.html) and [FPE](https://www.juntadeandalucia.es/temas/trabajar/formacion/fpe.html).

**Notice:** Eligibility, intensity, and compatibility of funding vary by regulations and current calls. Ordinaly provides course documentation but does not apply for or process subsidies or grants on behalf of the client. Always check official links before contracting.

hero.title: We automate with purpose
hero.subtitle: A multidisciplinary team building AI + automation that keeps humans in control and businesses moving faster.

mission.title: Augment people, not replace them
mission.body: We design automations that remove friction so teams can focus on creativity, decisions, and relationships.

vision.title: Automation everyone can trust
vision.body: Make intelligent workflows simple, transparent, and measurable for companies of any size.

1.title: Human-centered
1.body: We automate around people's strengths and habits—not the other way around.

2.title: Ship & learn
2.body: We pilot, measure, and iterate fast to keep momentum and reduce risk.

3.title: Transparent impact
3.body: Every workflow has a clear owner, KPI, and fail-safe so teams can trust the system.

2021.title: Foundations
2021.body: First internal frameworks for chat automation and Odoo connectors.

2022.title: Productizing
2022.body: Launched reusable n8n workflows and CX playbooks for early adopters.

2023.title: Scale
2023.body: Expanded to enterprise pilots, adding observability, RBAC, and QA layers.

2024.title: Trust layer
2024.body: Built governance packs and analytics to measure ROI for every flow.

story.title: From experiments to enterprise rollouts
story.lead: We started as builders obsessed with faster delivery. Today we partner with teams to scale AI and automation with governance, data, and trust.
